item.title: UT-162 East - Montezuma Creek
item.description: UT-162 east at Red Mesa Road in Montezuma Creek. Continue straight for Red Mesa; turn left to continue east on UT-162 to Aneth.

item.title: End UT-262 at UT-162
item.description: End UT-262 at UT-162. Turn right for UT-162 west; continue ahead for UT-162 east.

item.title: End UT-162 at UT-262
item.description: East end of UT-162 at UT-262 in Montezuma Creek.

item.title: UT-162 - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance sign on UT-262 to Aneth and Cortez, CO in Montezuma Creek.

item.title: UT-262 East - Montezuma Creek

item.title: UT-262 North - Montezuma Creek
item.description: UT-262 north shield in Montezuma Creek, at the UT-162 junction.
